title: Couple With Heart Person Man No Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Person and man holding hands with heart
description: Depicts a couple, one person identified as a person and the other as a man, with a heart between them symbolizing love and romance. This version has dark skin tones for both individuals.
apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple on Apple devices showcases two men, one with a neutral skin tone and the other with a dark skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart that glows with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D effect.  The figures are rendered with soft rounded edges and subtle gradients, emphasizing a sense of warmth and connection.  On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully symbolizes same-sex love, partnership, and enduring affection, conveying deep emotional bonds in digital conversations.
